description: The Pink Lady cocktail is a delightful drink that can be served any time of the day. It's pink in color and has a sweet taste to it, which makes this a favorite among many people.
name: Pink Lady

recipeInstructions.name: Shake the gin, applejack, lemon juice, and grenadine in a shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
